title: Zantarras Vengeance - Self Titled Demo(2008)
description:
ÃƒÂ¢??He felt he had passed beyond the bounds of vengeance and that he could no longer say, God is for and with meÃƒÂ¢?? Alexandre Dumas 

Zatarras Vengeance speaks the word of the real man, no need for restraint and with every intention to deal with the issues that we all turn a blind eye to. 

Hailing from the great city of Melbourne we bring a blend of thrash/groove metal with a dash of Hardcore, to bring you a tasty cocktail called Zatarras Vengeance. 

We are currently working away on completing our demo, for your listening pleasure you can listen to what we are currently working on. Tell us what you think guys. 

Influences Lamb of God, Pantera, Trivium, BLS, Strapping Young Lad, Metallica, Hatebreed, Avenged Sevenfold, Devildriver, Gojira, Machine Head, The Agony Scene, Textures, Mnemic, NIN, All that Remains, Caliban
